input.sentences: a group of friends threw a party for the lady .
she was so excited to be there .
they made a delicious fruit cake for her .
after the cake they said a few kind words about her .
at the end everyone wished her well .
output.sentences: The family reunion was set on a sunny weekend.
Aunt Peggy wore her silly outfit as usual.
Someone threw a bunch of strawberries on a cake and expected us to think it was pretty.
Cindy wrote a poem and made us all read it out loud.
I pretended to like everyone who was there.
